name: Komachi's Spirit Sorting VR
description:
Oh no there was an "incident" recently and a GAJILLION spirits died as a result! The incoming spirits think they're super cool and they decide to gang up on you! Your employer Eiki is on leave to deal with the source of the "incident" and has left the job of judging spirits up to you! 

With your trusty shinigami scythe in hand, slice the incoming spirits, avoid their bullets and send them to hell/reincarnation before they deal with you!

Non-VR players welcome to demo the scene!

Switch cameras by pressing "2" on your keyboard! Click in the game window to start looking!

Control the spectator camera by pressing "WASD" to move and mouse to look around!

Release your mouse by pressing "escape"!
